changes.rscadd: Adds sand. Dig it up with a shovel or your hand. Melt it into glass. Just keep it out of your eyes.

changes.qol: Shovels can drop their load into sacks.

changes.image: Adds icons for sand item and sand pile along with associated shovel icons.

changes.refactor: Moved generic behavior out of dirtclod into new parent objects for clod and clodpile.
